description: The bandwidth of the IMA group changes.
When the bandwidth of the IMA group changes, the IMA group bandwidth change alarm is reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwimaBandwidthChangeAlarmTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 IMA-MIB::imaGroupIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaAvailableTxbandwidth u 9999 HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaAvailableRxbandwidth u 9999

description: Frame Index,the number of the frame in the device.
This table is also adopted by the case-shaped device with Agent
(For example, the MA5105).
There is no frame in this kind of device. Thus it is placed on
the rack with other devices During implementation. The frame index
is specified as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: Slot index that identifies the physical position of a slot.
The case-shaped device is treated as the one with only one slot whose index is always set as 0.
If there are ports in the frame, all the ports on the frame must be virtualized as
a fixed slot index (equal to the virtual slots which is the max slot index for the frame plus
1.) Their slot index is also fixedly set as 0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: A unique value for the IMA Group.
variables.name: IMA-MIB::imaGroupIndex

description: The current cell rate provided by this IMA group in the transmitted direction
considering all the transmit links in the Active state.
Unit: kbps
variables.name: HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaAvailableTxbandwidth

description: The current cell rate provided by this IMA group in the received direction
considering all the receive links in the Active state.
Unit: kbps
variables.name: HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaAvailableRxbandwidth

description: The status of the IMA group changes.
When the status of the IMA group changes, the IMA group status change alarm is reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwimaGroupStatusChangeAlarmTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 IMA-MIB::imaGroupIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupState s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupAlarmState s EXAMPLE

variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: A unique value for the IMA Group.
variables.name: IMA-MIB::imaGroupIndex

description: The type of the IMA group alarm.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupState

description: The state of the IMA group alarm.
variables.name: HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupAlarmState

description: The status of the IMA link changes.
When the status of the IMA link changes, the IMA link status change alarm is reported.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwimaLinkStatusChangeAlarmTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaLinkID u 9999 HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupState s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-IMA-EXT-MIB::hwImaGroupAlarmState s EXAMPLE

description: Indicate the link ID
